00130 #include "nt3d_obj.h"

00132 enum NT3Dcontroller { NT3D_DrawStyle = 1000, 
00133                 NT3D_Slices, 
00134                 NT3D_Stacks,
00135                 NT3D_Texture
00136             } ;
00137 
00138  
00139 //
00140 //  Class name : NT3D_object_o
00141 //
00149 class NT3D_object_o : public NT3D_o {
00150 public:
00151   NT3D_object_o();
00152   NT3D_object_o(const NT_vector3_o & oNewPosition);
00153   NT3D_object_o(const NT3D_object_o & original);
00154    
00155   virtual ~NT3D_object_o();
00156   /*                         */  
00157   void Rotate( const NT_vector3_o & oDeltaRotation );
00158   void RotateX ( NTreal deltaRotX);
00159   void RotateY ( NTreal deltaRotY);
00160   void RotateZ ( NTreal deltaRotZ);
00161   void RotateXYZ ( NT_vector3_o oDeltaRot ) { oRotation += oDeltaRot; }
00162   void RotateXYZ ( const NTreal deltaRot[3] );
00163   void RotateNull () { oRotation = NT_OriginVec3();};
00164   void SetRotationX ( const NTreal rotX){ oRotation.x= rotX; }
00165   void SetRotationY ( const NTreal rotY){ oRotation.y= rotY; }
00166   void SetRotationZ ( const NTreal rotZ){ oRotation.z= rotZ; }
00167   void SetRotationXYZ ( const NT_vector3_o & oRot ) { oTranslation = oRot; }
00168   
00169   virtual void Translate( const NT_vector3_o & oDeltaTranslation ); 
00170   virtual void TranslateX ( const NTreal deltaTraX);
00171   virtual void TranslateY ( const NTreal deltaTraY);
00172   virtual void TranslateZ ( const NTreal deltaTraZ);
00173   virtual void TranslateXYZ ( const NT_vector3_o & oDeltaTra ) { oTranslation += oDeltaTra; }
00174   virtual void TranslateXYZ ( const NTreal deltaTra[3]);
00175   virtual void TranslateNull () { oTranslation = NT_OriginVec3();};
00176   virtual void SetTranslationX ( const NTreal traX){ oTranslation.x= traX; }
00177   virtual void SetTranslationY ( const NTreal traY){ oTranslation.y= traY; }
00178   virtual void SetTranslationZ ( const NTreal traZ){ oTranslation.z= traZ; }
00179   virtual void SetTranslationXYZ ( const NT_vector3_o & oTra ) { oTranslation = oTra; }
00180 
00183   void Collinearize (const NT_vector3_o & oRelativeVector);
00184 
00185 
00186   NT_vector3_o _oTranslation() const { return oTranslation; }
00187   NT_vector3_o _oRotation() const { return oRotation; }
00188 
00189 
00192   virtual void Draw() = 0;
00194   void Control(NT3Dcontroller cntrl , NTint value){ControlImpl(cntrl , value);}
00195   void Control(NT3Dcontroller cntrl , NTreal value){ControlImpl(cntrl , value);}
00196   void Control(NT3Dcontroller cntrl , NT_vector_o value){ControlImpl(cntrl , value);}
00197  
00198   protected:
00199   NT_vector3_o oTranslation;
00200   NT_vector3_o oRotation;
00201 
00205   virtual void ControlImpl(NT3Dcontroller cntrl , NTint value) = 0;
00206   virtual void ControlImpl(NT3Dcontroller cntrl , NTreal value) = 0; 
00207   virtual void ControlImpl(NT3Dcontroller cntrl , NT_vector_o value) = 0;
00208 
00209   private:
00210   double padding;
00211 
00212 };
